definitions.body: luxury: ´[[ת]] Pr 19:10; elsewhere pl.; cstr. [[תַּעֲנֻגוֹת]] Ec 2:8.
sf. [[בְּנֵי תַּעֲנוּנׇ֑יִךְ]] Mic 1:16 thy dainty sons; [[בֵּית תַּעֲנֻגֶיהָ]] Mic 2:9 her (their) dainty house(s), > of tender love (rdg. [[בְּנֵי]] Mic 2:9 We Now.
